           int version)
Generates a new graph instance with the given name and version.

Parameters:
name - The name of the graph to create
version - The version of the graph to create
Returns:
A new Graph

newArc

Arc newArc(G graph,
           Node startNode,
           Node endNode,
           String name)
           throws LoadException
Creates a new Arc with given start node, end node and node name.

Parameters:
startNode - The arc starting node
endNode - The arc ending node
name - The arc name
Returns:
The new Arc
Throws:
LoadException - If the arc can not be created, or if it is passed invalid data.

newNode

Node newNode(G graph,
             String name,
             String type,
             boolean isJoin,
             boolean isStart,
             String guard,
             List<Object> customList)
             throws LoadException
Creates a new Node.

Parameters:
graph - The graph which the node is part of
name - The node name
type - The node type
isJoin - Indicates whether the node is join node
isStart - Indicates whether the node is a start node
guard - The node guard
customList - A list of custom attributes from the xml file. May be empty or null.
Returns:
The new Node
Throws:
LoadException - If an error occurs while load, such as incorrect custom data is given.

                Node node,
                String instanceName)
Imports a node from an external graph into the given graph.

Parameters:
graph - The graph to import the node into
node - The node to import.
instanceName - The instance name given to the externa graph.
Returns:
The new, imported node

newProcess

GraphProcess newProcess(Graph graph)
Generates a new GraphProcess for the given Graph. Execution of the process is not started by this method. The method will be used by Engine.startProcess(Graph).

Parameters:
graph - The Graph the GraphProcess will be executing.
Returns:
A new GraphProcess

newNestedProcess

GraphProcess newNestedProcess(Graph graph,
                              NodeToken parentToken)
Generates a new GraphProcess for the given Graph. Execution of the process is not started by this method. This method is specfically for created a new nested process.

Parameters:
graph - The Graph the GraphProcess will be executing.
parentToken - The NodeToken whose execution is causing this nested process to be created.
Returns:
A new GraphProcess

newNodeToken

NodeToken newNodeToken(GraphProcess process,
                       Node node,
                       List<ArcToken> parents)
Generates a new NodeToken for the given GraphProcess, pointing to the given Node.

Parameters:
process - The GraphProcess which the new NodeToken will belong to
node - The Node the new NodeToken is being placed on
parents - The list of ArcTokens which preceded this NodeToken
Returns:
A new NodeToken

newNodeToken

NodeToken newNodeToken(GraphProcess process,
                       Node node,
                       ExecutionType executionType,
                       List<ArcToken> parents,
                       NodeToken envToken)
Generates a new NodeToken for the given GraphProcess, pointing to the given Node.

Parameters:
process - The GraphProcess which the new NodeToken will belong to
node - The Node the new NodeToken is being placed on
executionType - The ExecutionType represented by this node token.
parents - The list of ArcTokens which preceded this NodeToken
envToken - The token who's parents the new token should take its environment from. This means the new token will have the same starting environment as the passed in token.
Returns:
A new NodeToken

newArcToken

ArcToken newArcToken(GraphProcess process,
                     Arc arc,
                     ExecutionType executionType,
                     NodeToken parent)
Generates a new ArcToken for the given GraphProcess, pointing to the given Arc.

Parameters:
process - The GraphProcess which the new ArcToken will belong to
arc - The Arc the new ArcToken is being placed on
executionType - The ExecutionType represented by this arc token.
parent - The NodeToken which preceded this ArcToken.
Returns:
A new ArcToken

addType

void addType(String type,
             Class<? extends Node> nodeClass)
Adds the type to the GraphFactory for this engine. Specifies what class will be used for a given node type, when loading process definitions from XML file.

Parameters:
type - The type identifier, as used in the process definition file
nodeClass - The node class which will be instantiated for this type

addGlobalCustomType

void addGlobalCustomType(String type,
                         Class<? extends CustomNode> nodeClass)
Adds the type to the GraphFactory for this engine. Specifies what class will be used for a given node type, when loading process definitions from XML file.

Adds a class for a custom node type globally, for all GraphFactory instances. Only custom types can have global instances, since they are backend agnostic.

Parameters:
type - The type identifier, as used in the process definition file
nodeClass - The custom node class which will be instantiated for this type

addNodeFactory

void addNodeFactory(String type,
                    NodeFactory nodeFactory)
Allows custom loading logic to be used to create nodes of a specific type.

Parameters:
type - The node type, as used in the process definition XML file
nodeFactory - The factory used to create nodes of this type

getNodeFactory

NodeFactory getNodeFactory(String type)
Returns the NodeFactory for the given node type. If no factory has been specified (via addNodeFactory(String, NodeFactory)), a default factory may be returned.

Parameters:
type - The node type
Returns:
A node factory for the given type. If no factory has been specified for the given type, a default node factory may be returned.
